Intrathecal and systemic chemotherapy are given to prevent or treat the spread of leukemia cells to the brain and spinal cord. Sometimes radiation therapy to the brain is also given.   Treatments being studied in clinical trials for very highrisk ALL include new chemotherapy regimens with or without targeted therapy.
